firstQuote.quote: “Music is like a dream. One that I cannot hear.”

secondQuote.quote: “Without music, life would be a mistake”

thirdQuote.quote: “If I were not a physicist, I would probably be a musician. I often think in music. I live my daydreams in music. I see my life in terms of music.”

fourthQuote.quote: “One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.”

sixthQuote.quote: “Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination and life to everything.”

eighthQuote.quote: “The music is not in the notes, but in the silence between.”

ninthQuote.quote: “Music is the strongest form of magic.”

tenthQuote.quote: “Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.”
